name: i heard you call my name, in a dream - Gray Clutch Bag
description:
This soft clutch bag is made with a soft, distressed gray leather and artists canvas. It has been hand dyed gray in a cold water dye which is a process that develops over several hours. There is screen printing done by hand, i heard you call my name, in a dream. The clutch also has a hand dyed canvas lining in army green. Metal hardware throughout. Any scars, markings, rusting are all created during the process and are part of the distressed look of the design.

This clutch bag is one of a kind. Handmade in Brooklyn, New York.

*Measures 11.5" x 9"
*Gray distressed leather
*Hand dyed gray artists canvas in cold water dye gray
*Hand dyed army green lining
*Hand printed, i heard you call my name, in a dream
*Metal hardware
*One of a Kind
*Ships in 5-7 business days
*In the US, this piece ships via USPS Priority with tracking






All international orders are shipped USPS regular. Please be aware that this does not include a tracking number but it does come with a customs number. Please advise prior to your purchase if you require any change in the type of shipping you would like including priority, express mail, shipping insurance, etc. Duty/Import taxes are the responsibility of the customer. Sorry, I am unable to ship as "gift" on international orders.
Artlab is not responsible for lost or stolen packages. 
Refunds and Exchanges
I try to represent the merchandise true to what it is and offer quality and original merchandise. As I am a small business, I am unable to offer exchanges or refunds at this time.



THANK YOU FOR YOUR ORDER!

name: Gray Wool Scarf
description:
This charcoal gray scarf is 100% soft wool. This large scarf measures about 20" wide X 73" long. Perfect for male or female. On one end there is hand printed text which reads center back seam in english, french and spanish, a reference to a dressmakers pattern. 

artlab. Handmade in Brooklyn, New York.


*Printed by Hand to create a one of a kind piece. Text reads, center back seam , in english, french and spanish. A reference to a dress pattern.
*100% high quality Wool
*Soft
*Raw Edges on the ends with a stay stitch to prevent unraveling.
*One lengthwise selvedge edge and one lengthwise hemmed edge
*Dry clean
*Made in my Brooklyn Studio
*Ready to Ship (ships in 5-7 business days)
*In the US, this piece ships via USPS Priority
*Ships internationally from New York City

name: Dark Gray Linen Scarf No. 2
description:
This dark gray scarf is 100% soft linen. It has been hand dyed multiple times in a cold water gray dye which is a process that takes hours to several days. This gives the scarf a unique rich color with variations throughout. This large scarf measures about 25" wide X 90" long. Perfect for male or female. On one end there is hand printed text which reads center back seam in english, french and spanish, a reference to a dressmakers pattern. 

artlab. Handmade in Brooklyn, New York.

*Hand Dyed in cold water dye which develops over several hours. Gray tones which vary throughout
*Printed by Hand to create a one of a kind piece. Text reads, center back seam , in english, french and spanish. A reference to a dress pattern.
*100% Linen
*Soft
*Raw Edges lengthwise and hemmed edges on the ends.
*Easy to wash...hand wash cool, ring and hang to dry
*Made in my Brooklyn Studio
*Ready to Ship (ships in 5-7 business days)
*In the US, this piece ships via USPS Priority

name: Putty Leather Clutch, Gray Clutch Bag, Edgy Bags, Leather Pouch, Brooklyn Made Handbags
description:
This one of a kind clutch bag is made with a putty and black distressed leather and hand dyed gray artists canvas. It has been hand dyed in a gray cold water dye which is a process that develops over several hours. It is hand screen printed with text that reads Centre Back Seam in English, Spanish and French. It is fully lined in a medium weight canvas. Metal hardware throughout. Scars, markings, rusting are all created during the process and are part of the distressed look of the design.

This clutch bag is one of a kind.

*Measures 12" long x 5.5" high (30.48 cm X 13.97 cm)
*Putty and black distressed leather
*Hand dyed gray artists canvas
*Hand printed text
*Fully lined in canvas
*Metal hardware
*One of a Kind Handmade
*Ships in 5-7 business days
*In the US, this piece ships via USPS Priority with tracking

name: artlab Unisex Linen Scarf Brooklyn Industrial Screen Print
description:
This scarf is made with a light weight linen. It has been printed by hand in black ink of a 100 year old industrial building in Brooklyn, New York. Some areas are blacked out. The edges are professionally finished. Perfect for male or female. Made to Order. Each piece will be one of a kind and although the scarf will be exactly the same as the photo, the print is done by hand so it will be different from the photo. 

*100% lightweight handkerchief linen in a neutral color
*Hand Printed 
*Hemmed edges
*Made to order . Please allow 2 weeks to make your scarf plus shipping time.
*In the US, this piece ships via USPS Priority with tracking
*Ships internationally from New York City
